charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Jinin (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Jinin (S) is a former member of the seven swordsman of the mist. Using his sword Kabutowari he will demonstrate the power of the previous generation on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Silent Axe Slash
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Jinin (S) targets one enemy dealing 15 piercing damage. The following turn the target of this skill will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable or use counter skills(this is a stun effect). Kabutowari Wedge will be improved for 1 turn when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Kabutowari Wedge
abilities.description: Using Kabutowari Wedge Edo Tensei Jinin (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy. If Silent Axe Slash was effecting the target of this skill they will be unable to reduce damage or go invulnerable for 4 turns.

abilities.name: Kabutowari
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Jinin (S) uses Kabutowari on one enemy dealing 35 damage. That enemy's chakra and melee skills will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered.

abilities.name: Skilled Evasion
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Jinin (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
